title.value: Проблемы учета затрат на строительство жилых домов в сельскохозяйственных организациях с учетом изменений в законодательстве и применения МСФО
Problems of the expenses account for building construction in the agricultural organizations in view of changes in the legislation and IAS applications
Problems of the expenses account for building construction in the agricultural organizations in view of changes in the legislation and IAS applications

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Shcherbatyuk, S.Yu., Grodno State Agrarian Univ. (Belarus)

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus based on a review of existing regulations and international standards of accounting and financial reporting, the author justifies the need for the identification of agricultural organization as housing investment property (IAS 40 'The investment property') and in the process of sell¬ing housing workers organization as long-term assets available for sale (IFRS 5 'Non turnover actives intended for sale and stopped activity'). The author lays out the methodological approach to deal with these types of assets in the accounts and points to the need to develop at legislative level the appropriate standard on accounting the long-term actives and the investment real estate.
